title: Team Escape - Looking for Serious Top/Jungle for Teams!
body:
Hello there Summoners.

My name is Truesh0t and I am here on behalf of Team Escape who is looking for a Top AND Jungle main for ranked 5's Teams. 
Our requirements are simple. 
We are looking for people that are committed to the same goal. And that is to make it into the up-coming challenger oceanic series.
You must have (or are willing to) experience in high ranking 5v5 teams.  
It is preferred that you are of Diamond 5 rank in solo queue (at least), but we are taking anyone of at least Platinum+ who are willing
to impove not only as themselves, but mostly for the team. 

The midlaner and myself (ADC) were previously in a Diamond 1 team. And our support Diamond 2 team.
Our analyst is here for a helping hand for all who are selected into the 5 man main team. 

So if there is any questions, or if you just wanna chat, add:
IGN: Truesh0t (Captain)
Or
IGN: ESC Static (Analyst)

Thank you, and I hope to see you on the Summoners Rift.
